H0.text: One question, three answers. Which three cyclists have won this award? (In any order.). Jacques Anquetil

H1.text: One question, three answers. Which three cyclists have won this award? (In any order.). Fausto Coppi

H2.text: One question, three answers. Which three cyclists have won this award? (In any order.). Bernard Hinault

H3.text: One question, three answers. Which three cyclists have won this award? (In any order.). TOM SIMPSON

A4.text: Fausto Coppi set the hour record (45.798 km) in 1942

A5.text: The record stood until it was beaten by Jacques Anquetil in 1956
